name: Stuck in a pool!
description:
Imagine you were busy creating a game the last three days - you feel exhausted and in dire need of relaxation! You fancy a cool pool, sunshine and a swim ring to laze around. Good you are here! We provide smoothing beats, beautiful flair! and fun in the pool. But whoopsie! It looks like you ate too many Nachos during the Ludum Dare! You gained weight and are not only stuck in your swim ring but also in the pool! Time to find a way to get out!

Sadly you are too heavy to get over the pool edge or even swim against the current! But … Woahh!..You have enough energy to dash and splash!
Just use the mouse and click + drag to dash or
click to splash. Maybe you can find the exit or get on the nerves of these NPCs!

S P O I L E R

---------------------------------------------------

Psst...if you have any problems, here are some tips:
With your splash you can trigger people or objects,
and have you ever played bumper cars? ;)

---------------------------------------------------
